title: SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN_PARAMS
content:
0xF5A2C681787E579D0x76C641E4// SetScriptGfxAlignParams
void SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN_PARAMS(float x, float y, float w, float h);Parameters:x: The X offset for the item to be drawn.y: The Y offset for the item to be drawn.w: The width of the item to be drawn.h: The height of the item to be drawn.Sets the draw offset/calculated size for SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN. If using any alignment other than left/top, the game
expects the width/height to be configured using this native in order to get a proper starting position for the draw
command.Old name:  _SCREEN_DRAW_POSITION_RATIO
codeBlocks:
// SetScriptGfxAlignParams
void SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN_PARAMS(float x, float y, float w, float h);
